definition: to irrigate/to pour water into/to inject water into meat to increase its weight (plumping)/to cook the books/to post low-value messages (small talk etc) on Internet forums
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Different irrigation maximums also influenced plant significantly at blooming and fruit-bearing stage.
sentences.chinese: 不同灌水上限對開花結果期也有顯著影響。

sentences.english: Irrigating water quota has a remarkable effect on leaf area and plant height.
sentences.chinese: 灌水定額對夏玉米葉面積和株高有顯著影響。

sentences.english: So I try to fill my stomach with water to rescue my soal from being vaporized.
sentences.chinese: 玩命的往肚裏灌水，以挽留要被陽光蒸發的靈魂。

sentences.english: Flowering period should be few irrigation fertilization.
sentences.chinese: 開花結果期宜少灌水施肥。

sentences.english: At podding stage, the proper irrigation is beneficial to plumpness of alfalfa seeds.
sentences.chinese: 結莢期適當灌水有利於苜蓿籽粒飽滿。

sentences.english: The wheat (T. aestivum L. ) germplasm resources with drought resistance were grown in the field under rainfed and irrigated conditions respectively.
sentences.chinese: 在雨養和灌水條件下，田間栽培小麥抗旱材料。

sentences.english: If it were watered too early the roots would rot.
sentences.chinese: 如果灌水太早，就會爛根。

sentences.english: Drip or ooze systems are common for pot watering .
sentences.chinese: 滴灌和滲灌系統一般也用於盆栽灌水。

sentences.english: This is the water district. Why reduce my score?
sentences.chinese: 這是灌水區。爲啥扣我的分？

sentences.english: Multiple-outlet pipe of varying orifice size has been used to pipe in micro-irrigation system very often.
sentences.chinese: 變孔徑多孔管道是微灌系統中常用的一種灌水管道。

sentences.english: With the increase of irrigation amount, the lengths of fibers have a tendency to increase.
sentences.chinese: 不同灌溉方式和灌水定額對棉花衣分影響很小。

sentences.english: The paper researches the effect of irrigation technology parameters on irrigating water quota.
sentences.chinese: 研究了灌水技術要素對膜孔灌灌水定額的影響。

sentences.english: The paper researches the effect of irrigation technology parameters on irrigating water quota.
sentences.chinese: 研究了灌水技術要素對膜孔灌灌水定額的影響。

sentences.english: A method of quantifying irrigation for manilagrass (Zoysia metrilla) turf is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 以溝葉結縷草爲例，推薦一種有效定量灌水方法。

sentences.english: Principles outlined for furrow irrigation apply to related methods of irrigation.
sentences.chinese: 簡述的溝灌原理也適用於相近的灌水方法。

sentences.english: Shi sufficient fertilizer, flowering period should be few irrigation fertilization.
sentences.chinese: 施足有機肥，開花結果期宜少灌水施肥。
